src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者董瑞丰、顾天成）国务院联防联控机制日前印发关于加强口岸城市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的通知，要求近期离开陆地边境口岸城市（与香港、澳门有口岸相连的除外）人员需持有48小时内核酸检测阴性证明，前往陆地边境口岸城市人员抵达后至少进行1次核酸检测。
retrieved_src: 九十年代以来，我国实行全方位对外开放，先后开放了13个边境口岸城市，开放了包括西部地区在内的各省会（自治区首府）城市。
retrieved_ref: Since the 1990s,China has opened to the outside world in all directions. One after another,it has opened 13 border port cities and all provincial(and autonomous regional)capitals,including those in the western region.
new_mt: The State Council's Joint Prevention and Control Mechanism recently issued a notice on strengthening the epidemic prevention and control work in border port cities. It requires that people who leave the land border port cities (except those connected to Hong Kong and Macao) within 48 hours must have a negative nucleic acid test certificate, and people who arrive in the land border port cities must undergo at least one nucleic acid test.

src: 根据通知，上述要求的时间范围为，从各省区市确定口岸城市范围并公告之日起，至2022年3月15日。

src: 中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习圆满结束-新华网
retrieved_ref: Labour Force Projections for 2002-2021
new_mt: China, Vietnam hold joint military drill

src: 新华社河内12月12日电（周娜 滕怀金）12日上午，参加中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习的中方参演分队全部安全返回中国广西境内，标志着此次持续7天的演训任务顺利完成。
retrieved_src: 今年至今的通货膨胀率 （2016年7月相对于2015年12月） 为 -0.2%。相比2015年7月，2016年7月的年通货膨胀率为 -0.2%。
retrieved_ref: The inflation rate since the beginning of the year(July 2016 compared to December 2015)has been -0.2% and the annual inflation in July 2016 compared to July 2015 was -0.2%.
new_mt: On December 12, 2021, the Chinese military medical team participating in the joint exercise "Peace and Relief-2021" between China and Vietnam safely returned to China. This marks the successful completion of the 7-day joint exercise.

src: 此次联演，中越两军围绕人道主义医学救援这一重大课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务，按照实战化标准完成了联合卫勤指挥、联合现场救援、批量伤员处置等课目内容，有效提升了两军卫勤保障能力。
retrieved_src: 哪里有呼唤，他们就出现在哪里，一次次为部队提供优质的卫勤保障，一次次为人民解除了危难，为人民军队赢得了荣誉。
retrieved_ref: They are always there when they are needed,and have won the acclaim of the people and the army by providing the troops with medical protection of high quality and helping the people overcome their crisis time and time again.
new_mt: This time, the two armies have focused on the humanitarian medical rescue issue around the theme of humanitarian medical rescue, and have closely followed the medical rescue and rescue of the wounded missions, and have completed the joint command of medical rescue, joint field rescue, and mass treatment of wounded personnel according to the standard of actual combat, effectively improving the joint medical rescue capabilities of the two armies.

src: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
retrieved_src: 他说，近年来，在中越双方的共同努力下，中越两党两国关系得到了新的发展。
retrieved_ref: He said : With the joint efforts of both China and Vietnam,relations between the CPC and the CPV and between China and Vietnam have enjoyed new development in recent years.
new_mt: The results of the joint exercises have been recognized by both the Chinese and Vietnamese armies.

src: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
retrieved_src: 第七舰队官方网站指出，17日的演习，是在国际水域上进行的一种“交汇演习”（passingexercise），这种演习提供美军在海底、海面、海上的作战训练机会，而为了训练联合作战能力，美国空军也参加了这次的演习。
retrieved_ref: The US Seventh Fleet 's website also stated : The US Seventh Fleet staged on 17 August a passing exercise in international waters,in order to train its units in underwater,surface,and sea operations. For the sake of training in joint operations,the US Air Force also participated in the recent exercise.
new_mt: The Vietnamese People's Army Medical Department's Deputy Commander and Deputy Chief of the General Staff, Nguyen Xuan Son, said at the closing ceremony that the Vietnamese Army Medical Department had learned a lot about the organization and professional activities of the exercise from the Chinese Army Medical Department.

src: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
retrieved_src: 周世其说,鸡场周围的自然环境利于疫情防控,降低了疫情向外传播的可能性。
retrieved_ref: The natural environment of the farm is helpful for the prevention and control of the epidemic,greatly reducing the transmission possibility of the highly infectious disease,said Zhou.
new_mt: The results achieved in the joint exercise proved the professional capabilities of the two countries in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.

src: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
retrieved_src: 这是伟大的５年，辉煌的５年，具有里程碑意义的５年。
retrieved_ref: These were five great years,five brilliant years,five years that would go down as a milestone in history.
new_mt: Chen Chunming, director of the coordination and guidance group of the Chinese side and deputy director of the medical department of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission, said that this exercise is based on the successful holding of the joint medical rescue activities in 2018 and is another innovative practice to open up new ground, with very important milestone significance.

src: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
retrieved_src: 国内第一家生产血氧浓度分析仪、耳温枪等医用器材的康定科技，目前就遭遇到这种困扰。
retrieved_ref: This is precisely the problem now being faced by Comdek,the first company in Taiwan to produce medical instruments such as blood-oxygen monitors and ear thermometers.
new_mt: During the drill, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing equipment to the Vietnamese People's Army.
